name: Ol' Crow Crew No. 1: Scratchnasty, The Breakneck Grotgant
description:
Ol' Crow Crew No. 1: Scratchnasty, The Breakneck Grotgant

Deep in the wide Sargasso Drift, Captain Panik and the Ol' Crow Crew live on love, plunder and warpsauce. Hard liquor and fist fighting forever!

Scratchnasty, an AI warbot of indeterminate antiquity, is controlled by Mother Knuckle through eldritch communion with his machine spirit. However, Scratchnasty’s crew-  the clandestine goblin freedom fighters known only as Golf Lima Foxtrot - have sworn a pact with the sly old witch to steal Clawhammer's killswitch from about Captain Panik’s neck, a trinket that- while it is in his position- cements his ascendancy over her. Should the plot ever succeed, the GLO could escape into the scablands and live free as nomads, whilst back on Turtle Rock the Ol’ Crow Crew would see a change of management.
Scratchbuilt model, photographed and altered digitally, one of a series with interlocking narratives.
